subject: Shifting of utilities on BOT projects.
text: IT4 <TEfl& <THD ufadrut T49 / Phona: 91-11-25074100125074200 _ (7 97ut, Uo$ 9aet & (vnn +g) 44 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 QFA , {Extn;: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Qa 6, 8e27-10, ETrT, * fori-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-t10075 No: 11041/21/2002-Admn January 10; 2006 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL 62/2006 [Decision iaken on BOT II Division'$ note and weekly reeting dated 07.12.2005] Sub: Shifting of utilities on BOT Projects It has been decided with the approval of the Competent Authority that the work relating to shifting of utilities could be carried out through the concessionaires of the respective BOT projectgon the rateslestimates approved by the concerned utility deparlmentsof the State as already carried out for many projects because involvement of separate agency through competitive bidding may result in delay in implementation &nd contractual complications.
